title.content-text: 4.3.2 - C I D R and Route Summarization

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must determine if the IP address with the C I D R information is a Subnet or a Route Summary, based on the IP address provided.

A.172.24.0.0 /14.
B.192.168.17.192 /26.
C.10.24.0.0 /16.
D.172.17.4.0 /24.
E.10.0.100. 0/24.
F.172.128.0.0 /12.
G.192.168.0.0 /23.
